description: A square of fine white linen battiste surrounded by a white flaxen thread lacis embroidered with same thread and gold thread. Between the square of battiste and the lacis border as also on the edge which has an exquisite gold and fine thread scalloped edge the same fine cut border completes the square. Design is complete.
medium: Linen; Punto Ricamato a Maglia Quadra; lace
title: Panel
